homegrown-power-plan.title: The Homegrown Power Plan
homegrown-power-plan.description: The Homegrown Power Plan, a joint project between GetUp! and Solar Citizens, shows how we can repower the country with 100% renewable power by 2030. How? By rebooting our failing electricity system, removing the roadblocks holding us back, and investing in the renewables boom.

fair-go-tas.title: Fair go for Tassie Solar
fair-go-tas.description: Tasmania is in the grip of an energy crisis. Record low dam levels have incapacitated hydro power, our state has lost the Basslink connection to the mainland grid and deadlines to fix it have been missed repeatedly. Tell the Tasmanian government that the answer lies in clean, renewable energy, not expensive diesel.

vote-1-solar.title: Vote 1 Solar
vote-1-solar.description: This election, we’re going all out to get all major parties on board with 100% renewable electricity by 2030. Sign the petition today to call on all parties and candidates to get Australia on the path to a clean, sun-powered future.

solar-scorecard.title: Please write a letter about Solar Scorecard
solar-scorecard.description: It's powerful when people take action together, to let your community know about solar in your area, write to your local newspapers to let them know about the Solar Scorecard. /n Please enter your letter to the editor below:

letter.title: Write your letter to the editor

letter-to-the-editor.title: Write your letter to the editor
letter-to-the-editor.description: Over 5 millions Australians are now getting power from the sun, and the number of solar rooftop soar from less than 15,000 to 1.6 million in just seven years. Solar means jobs, investment and cheaper power bills for all consumers but not everyone is on board. Australia’s biggest power companies, and some of our own politicians, have done their best to hold back the rooftop revolution. Sending a letter to your local paper about why a sun-powered futures is so important to you and to Australia is a key way to show support for solar is stronger than ever. Let’s get the right message out there. Fill in your details below, select the publications you’d like to send your letter to and then send your message.
